title: SMC_GroupSetDynamics (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupSetDynamics
This function block allows setting a dynamic model for an axis group.
Setting a dynamic model allows the axis group to calculate and limit
axis torques.
Setting or changing the dynamic model is only allowed while the axis
group is disabled.
See SMC_ChangeDynamicLimits in SM3_Basic for setting axis torque limits.
Note
A load (see
SMC_GroupSetLoad
) will be reset when executing this
function block.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: The dynamic model is set on a rising edge

rows:
The dynamic model.  Setting it to 0 removes the current
dynamic model and disables calculation and limitation of
axis torques.
The gravitational acceleration, defined in the MCS in u/s^2.

rows.Name: Done
rows.Comment: The dynamic model has been set successfully

rows: The function block is not finished
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
